products.title: Valencia Grey Vertical Blind

A busy kitchen or living room will benefit from this delicate, translucent design in ths modern grey shade, that will leave the space feeling open, light and airy. Flame retardant and pollergen-coated, makes this sheer roller blind a fantastic addition to your living space.
